title: "repairing" league of legends client
body: I started up league today and it immediately opened up a window with a progress bar and "repairing" written on it. I was really confused as i didnt know what it was repairing because it was working a couple of days ago (it glitched out last night but i didn't pay much attention). I've searched all over the internet and no one has mentioned this so i have no idea whats going on. Right now i dont think the progress bar is moving, it has been at least  half an hour and im pretty sure the bar has reached the end and then restarted again. I have no idea what to do, can someone help me.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you still experiencing an issue?
